author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
Here's an example of a mass surveillance tool that is used by many police and sheriff departments. It uses your phone location history to figure out your location patterns. So if you're found in a particular area, law enforcement (or private companies) can trace your patterns that show your residence, work and activities over a period of time.

----------------------------------

title: Mass Surveillance from a Corporate Source: ‘Fog Data Science’
